string.name: about_usp1
string.u: Bringo home is all about getting stuff ordered in the neighborhood area with best service and rates. Customer can simply buy grocery or get any service related to home maintenance with a click of a button now. Our customers can actually see how many feets/meter away is the store and what price is this store offering before deciding to do business with this store or other.

string.name: about_usp2
string.u: Bringo provides all type of stores and services however major categories include : For Stores- General Store, Grocery Store, Electrical store, Chicken or Meat Shop etc and for Services it includes : Electrician, Beautician, AC repairs, Mechanic , General Physician, Doctors etc.

string.name: about_usp3
string.u: So for e.g You feeling like getting your hair-cutting done at home? Just Bringo!!!! Or for that matter if you want to get Corner-store Chai/Tea delivered at home : Just Bringo!!!
